name: FountainNoise
0:
”Alexa open Fountain Noise”
”Alexa ask Fountain Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fountain noise
des:
Experience the tranquil ambiance of a flowing fountain. This skill offers the gentle sound of water cascading, creating a peaceful environment perfect for relaxation and focus

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Fountain Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
